subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Voice inflections?
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0234_01CA36E5.EB240EE0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

There are people who say that you can influence what you get psychically, t=
hat though you didn't consciously know about that information, you subconsc=
iously knew it.

I don't buy that. I have seen absolutely no real proof of =
that ever happening.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Misty Dawn 
 =
 To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, September 16, 2009 3:30 PM=

  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Voice inflections?


    There is no doubt in=
 my mind about that. You are right April =3D) In the beginning I did seek s=
ome proof for my own sanity. But time and time again I have learned much mo=
re than I ever expected to. For me its become more than about contact with =
my dead loved ones, its more about learning and growing from the experience=
s. That definitely has been the end result. 

        Misty

        --- On=
 Wed, 9/16/09, April Abercrombie <april@...> wrote=
:


          From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
=
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Voice inflections?
          To: EVP-I=
TC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesday, September 16, 2009, 5:14 PM

=

            
          I would definitely call that proof. The strength of=
 the proof is in the part that you knew nothing about what the message woul=
d mean to the person, or if it a message for you, it was some fact that you=
 had not known prior.

          IMO, in this case there is no way it would=
 be a case matrixing or hearing what you wanted or expected to hear, that i=
t was real information conveyed through an intelligent source.

           =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: bulletbabea 
            T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent: Wednesday, September 16, 200=
9 2:46 PM
            Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Voice inflections?


         =
     
            I think quite often when the message isn't for me and it'=
s for someone outside of this research it matters very much that the messag=
e is something I myself would never know. It hits home so much more for the=
 recipient. To me it may seem dumb or meaningless but to the person who the=
 message is for it can have a deeper impact because they know theres no way=
 possible I could know the info. And vice versa when the message is for me =
sometimes the info doesnt become clear til much later down the road when I =
learn that bit of info or watch that predictive message become reality. It'=
s all very interesting and educational =3D)

            Misty

           =
 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "April Abercrombie" <april@...> wrote:
  =
          >
            > The only way to prove 100% that something you rec=
eive through the box is authentic communication, is if they say something t=
hat you can verify, something you yourself did not know.
            > 
   =
         > ----- Original Message ----- 
            > From: Misty Dawn 
  =
          > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
            > Sent: Wednesday, Se=
ptember 16, 2009 3:41 AM
            > Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Voice inflect=
ions?
            > 
            > 
            > I have gotten many life l=
ike voices over the years. My first evp was my mothers voice and no boxes w=
ere involved. The box is a tool/method and there are many ways to get their=
 voices heard. So in the different methods I have used, yes I have heard vo=
ices that resemble their lifetime charachteristics and tones. Is it always =
that way? No. 
            > 
            > Most often the group will speak=
 as one voice because I have requested they do so. One voice tone will begi=
n a sentence and another will end it. So I may hear my female friends voice=
 start off a thought and an unknown male voice finish the sentence. And vic=
e versa often they speak in tones which do not even come close to what they=
 sounded like in life. Quite often they are spirits I didnt know in life. I=
 may get someone saying This is edison, and then find an old recording he d=
id where he starts it off saying This is edison, but for me I do not know t=
he man so there is no recognition for me. I document it and file it away as=
 a curiousity.
            > 
            > I always laugh when people say =
thats not your mother or friend thats something trying to fool you and mess=
 with your head. I knew my mother longer than anyone and its interesting th=
at it is easier for those people to believe that its possible that somethin=
g/someone else is speaking pretending to be my mother but its much harder f=
or them to believe that quite possibly that really is my mother keeping her=
 promise to stay in touch after death. If one is possible then so is the ot=
her. I tend to be stubborn in some respects in that I dont instantly believ=
e what anyone tells me whether living or not. If they give me a message I t=
hink is dumb I am very reluctant to pass it on and usually those are the on=
es that get the biggest confirmations tho it means nothing to me at the tim=
e. So yes quite possibly evp work can be used the same as mediumship in mis=
sing persons cases.
            > 
            > For me tone of voice has g=
rown to mean nothing. It is a treat when they manage to come across soundin=
g as they did when in physical form here but I look beyond the tone of voic=
e. Often people get a childs voice and they become saddened by the thought =
that a child is earthbound. But I see it just as a representation of voice =
and whether it comes across as male female child or robot matters little to=
 me.
            > 
            > I do find they often resume the "characte=
r" they played because after all that is sort of what we are, characters in=
 some giant play. Whether it is the beliefs they had which were their trade=
mark, the tone of voice, their image, or use of some nickname even I dont k=
now about I look at it all as just a pixel in a larger portrait that some p=
art survives once the body has ceased to function. And the message is simpl=
y, our energy continues on.
            > 
            > Quote by Einstein:=
 'Energy cannot be created or destroyed, it can only be changed from one fo=
rm to another.'
            > 
            > Misty (the insomniac is up way=
 tooooo late and rambling on LOL)
            > 
            > --- On Tue, =
9/15/09, mrscaptainjack2 <jjkamp@...> wrote:
            > 
            > 
=
            > From: mrscaptainjack2 <jjkamp@...>
            > Subject: [EV=
P-ITC] Voice inflections?
            > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
      =
      > Date: Tuesday, September 15, 2009, 9:56 PM
            > 
         =
   > 
            > 
            > I was googling about AM radio reception,=
 and I came across the below exchange on a forum. It talks about using the =
box to find missing persons (which I didn't know was possible), and the con=
versation mentions hearing specific voice inflections and recognizing a dea=
d person's specific voice on the box. My question is, do any of you get a r=
ecognizable voice? The voices I get always sound robotic, although I do get=
 clearly male or female voices. 
            > 
            > http://www.it=
cbridg e.com/forum/ view_topic. php?id=3D515& forum_id=3D 31
            >
=
